patterns: Tell me about your data science skills
What are your expertise areas in data science?
responses: I have expertise in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Data Analytics.
My skills include LLMA, Time Series Analysis, Data Visualization, and Power BI.
I specialize in supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms, regression, and object detection.

patterns: What programming languages do you know?
responses: I am proficient in Python including Pytorch, Pandas, Scikit Learn and other Data Science essentials also C, C++, and SQL.
I hold a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science with an aggregate of 75% from Mandsaur University (2020-24).
I completed my Senior Secondary education with a percentage of 79.6% from St. Thomas Sr. Sec. School (2019-20).

patterns: Tell me about your work experience
responses: I have worked as a Software Developer Trainee at Simtrak Solutions (Storewise) working on python backend projects from May 2023 to August 2023 and Currently, I am a Machine Learning Engineer at FODUU (Foundation Of Design Uprising Unit) since September 2023.

I have worked on various projects, including Computer Vision, NLP using Python. Some notable projects involve leveraging FastAPI and leading object detection and classification projects using YOLO model and also built a model from scratch for project work you can check the GitProfile
I have skills in EDA using Python, data visualization, and expertise in analyzing datasets for strategic decision-making.
My interests include reading novels, playing guitar, stock market analysis, and cooking.

patterns: Tell me about your technical stack
responses: I work with PyTorch, NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Playwright, and Matplotlib in my projects.
I worked on various CNN, RNN projects and also used some Machine learning algorithms for it.

patterns: Tell me about your career goals
What do you aim to achieve in your career?
responses: My career objectives include advancing my skills in machine learning and artificial intelligence, contributing to impactful projects, and eventually taking on a leadership role in the field.
I aspire to become a versatile professional, applying my data science expertise to solve complex problems and make significant contributions to the technology industry.
My career goals involve continuous learning, staying updated with emerging technologies, and making a positive impact through innovative solutions.

patterns: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
responses: I am a undergraduate and currently in my last semester with a Bachelor's in Computer Science. As a Software Developer Trainee at Simtrak Solutions, I honed skills in Python, databases, and web scraping. Currently a Machine Learning Trainee at FODUU, focusing on advancing skills in ML and AI. Beyond tech, I enjoy reading novels, playing guitar, and analyzing the stock market.
I tend to be overly critical of my work, aiming for perfection. To address it, I've focused on setting realistic goals, breaking tasks into smaller steps, and seeking feedback to maintain efficiency.

In 5 years, I see myself as a seasoned data scientist contributing to innovative projects. Aspiring to take on a leadership role, mentor a team, and stay at the forefront of tech advancements through continuous learning.
